review:
We wanted to take a moment to express our sincere gratitude for the excellent care you provided to our newborn baby. Your expertise and fine wisdom in avoiding the immediate use of antibiotics after the delivery and your continuous communication with us throughout the process truly made a difference in the outcome of our baby's health.

Your approach and experience were exceptional, and we are grateful for the care you provided. We appreciate the way you took the time to explain each step of the process to us and answered all our questions. Your attention to detail and dedication to your profession were evident in the care you provided.

Your decision to avoid unnecessary medication for our baby and your keen observation skills have undoubtedly contributed to the quick recovery of our baby. Your actions have instilled confidence in us and made a lasting impact.

Once again, we extend our sincere thanks to you for your exceptional care and for making a difference in the life of our baby. Your work is truly appreciated.

With heartfelt thanks,

Dr. Vinay told me each and everything in very crystal clear words about the vaccination of my baby. He told me about the options available and then I had to decide which option to go with. I have heard that vaccination is very tough for newborns but the way Dr. vinay handled my babies vaccination schedule is just amazing. I would recommend each and everyone to go with Dr. vinay  for vaccination of newborn as he is best in the field.

Highly Recommend! The best paediatrician I have come across.  He is warm and welcoming. Excellent in understanding the concern and guides with the best option available. will certainly continue to seek his advice.
